tool_description: Ahrefs API: SEO powerhouse featuring keyword research, backlink analysis, and SERP tracking tools for maximizing website visibility and rankings.
name: Ahrefs
title: Ahrefs

api_list.name: Keyword Difficulty Checker
api_list.description: Find out how hard it'll be to rank in the top 10 for any keyword.

api_list.name: SERP Checker
api_list.description: Analyze the top 10 rankings for any keyword in any country.

api_list.name: Keyword Rank Checker
api_list.description: Check your site's ranking position in any country.

api_list.name: Website Traffic Checker
api_list.description: See search traffic estimates for any website or webpage.

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following:

- **Exact URL:** Only specified URL `example.com/path/`
- **Subdomains:** Domain including subdomains `*.example.com/*`

api_list.name: Backlink Checker
api_list.description: See the top 100 backlinks to any website or webpage.

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following:

- **Exact URL:** Only specified URL `example.com/path/`
- **Subdomains:** Domain including subdomains `*.example.com/*`

api_list.name: Broken Link Checker
api_list.description: Find broken links to and from any webpage or website in seconds.

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following:

- **Exact URL:** Only specified URL `example.com/path/`
- **Subdomains:** Domain including subdomains `*.example.com/*`

api_list.name: Website Authority Checker
api_list.description: Check the Domain Rating (DR) of any website to see the strength of its backlink profile.

api_list.name: Amazon Keyword Generator
api_list.description: Find what people are searching for on Amazon, and align your product listings with those terms.

api_list.name: YouTube Keyword Generator
api_list.description: Get more views on YouTube by researching keywords people are searching for.

api_list.name: Bing Keyword Generator
api_list.description: Discover the keywords people search for on Bing. Analyze their SEO potential.

api_list.name: Google Keyword Generator
api_list.description: Find thousands of relevant keyword ideas in seconds.
